detaileddescription.para: An XML-RPC implementation by Keith Devens, version 2.5f. http://www.keithdevens.com/software/xmlrpc/

This code is Open Source, released under terms similar to the Artistic License. Read the license at http://www.keithdevens.com/software/license/ Note: this code requires version 4.1.0 or higher of PHP.

xrefdescription.para: Generates the following error on DreamHost servers (and possible others) at different places in the file: Warning: Call-time pass-by-reference has been deprecated; If you would like to pass it by reference, modify the declaration of xml_set_object(). If you would like to enable call-time pass-by-reference, you can set allow_call_time_pass_reference to true in your INI file. in /home/.zerlina/dkeenan/upc.dankeenan.org/xmlrpc.inc
